altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール - DRAGON BALL K
ドラゴンボール - 悟空&カリフラ

description.en:
Little biographical manga centered around Goku and Caulifla!
The timeline is set after "Dragon Ball Super: Broly"
description.ja:
悟空とカリフラを中心にちょっとした外伝漫画です
時間軸は「ＤＢ超ブロリー」後になります
ブウ編までは原作、DB超はアニメ基準です

description.en: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
description.ja: 成績優秀、バスケは天才的、そして校内の人気者・一ノ瀬翔麗を兄に持つ一ノ瀬陽斗。バスケは大嫌いと言いつつ、一人特訓して兄に挑戦しては返り討ちに遭う日々。一方で兄・翔麗は誰よりも陽斗の「才能」を認めている様子だが、その正体は…!?
description.pt-br: Haruto Ichinose tem um irmão mais velho, Shori Ichinose, que tem notas excelentes, é um prodígio do basquete e é muito popular na escola. Embora Haruto diga que odeia basquete, ele treina sozinho e desafia seu irmão, apenas para ser derrotado. Por outro lado, seu irmão mais velho Shori parece reconhecer seu "talento" mais do que qualquer outra pessoa, mas quem ele realmente é...?

description.en: An era of peace between the hero and demon lord is upon us! In this peaceful world, the hero Corleo is nothing but an empty suit. But one day, a hero and demon lord from another world appear before him! How will Corleo deal with the chaos these invaders bring to his world?! A new type of fantasy epic now begins!

title.en: Kuchi ga Saketemo Kimi Ni Wa

altTitles.en: Even If You Slit My Mouth

description.en:
Miroku-san, the slit-mouth woman, is to marry high school student Kouichi to maintain her existence as his family has been in charge of upkeeping superstitions for generations. To add, there seems to be another reason that he seems more than willing…   
  
Miroku, however, would rather use her own strength than borrow that of others. Thus, they establish a contract as follows.  
1. For a trial period of a year, they are to act as though they were married.  
2. If she is able to scare him within that year, the engagement will be broken.  
 
---

*This is the three-part short story's official serialization, which began on the Shonen Jump+ website on November 10, 2020.*
description.fr:
Miroku-san, la femme à la bouche fendue, doit épouser Kouichi, un lycéen, pour maintenir son existence, car sa famille est responsable de l'entretien des superstitions depuis des générations. Pour ajouter, il semble y avoir une autre raison pour laquelle il semble plus que disposé …   
  
Miroku, cependant, préfère utiliser sa propre force plutôt que d'emprunter celle des autres. Ainsi, ils établissent un contrat comme suit.   
1. Pendant une période d'essai d'un an, ils doivent agir comme s'ils étaient mariés.   
2. Si elle parvient à lui faire peur dans l'année, l'engagement sera rompu.
description.pt-br:
Miroku-san, a mulher com a boca cortada, vai se casar com o estudante Kouichi do ensino médio para manter sua existência, já que sua família é responsável por manter superstições há gerações. Para adicionar, parece haver outra razão pela qual ele parece mais do que disposto...

Miroku, entretanto, prefere usar sua própria força do que pedir emprestada a de outros. Assim, eles estabelecem um contrato:
1. Por um período experimental de um ano, devem agir como se estivessem casados;
2. Se ela conseguir assustá-lo naquele ano, o noivado será rompido.

description.en:
Kantarou, a folklore scholar living in the Taisho period, has various and sundry adventures. But Kantarou moonlights as an exorcist solving the problems of ghosts and demons, all with the help of Haruka, the legendary demon-eating tengu!  
  
Note: The current serialization is in a shoujo magazine - Comic Blade Avarus.

Fuyuka is a female college student attending an art college in Tokyo, despite her parents' opposition. She feels guilty about leaving her younger brother, who has been supporting her in their strict family home, and running away from home by herself. One day, she is at her wit's end because she can't pay the rent, when her grown-up younger brother, Ameon, appears in front of her...! She is now living together with her brother, whose love is too heavy for her to bear!

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主大人，接下來是“拷問”時間

altTitles.zh: 公主大人，接下来是“拷问”时间

description.de:
Die illustre und militärisch begnadete Prinzessin des Königreiches wurde von Schergen des Dämonenfürsten gefangen genommen und in Ketten gelegt. Darauf bedacht, jede auch noch so kleine Information aus ihr herauszupressen, setzt der Dämonenfürst seine Großinquisitorin darauf an, die Prinzessin zum Reden zu bringen.  
  
Kann sie dieser schier endlosen Folter widerstehen? Oder knickt sie bei den Verhören ein und offenbart ihrem erbitterten Feind vitale Informationen über ihr geliebtes Königreich?  
  
Dies ist die Geschichte jener armen Prinzessin und der Qualen, die sie im Zuge der Verhöre erleiden muss.
description.en: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!
description.id:
Seorang Putri yang ditahan oleh pasukan Raja Iblis, disiapkan untuk menerima siksaan dari Raja Iblis tanpa henti!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Chapter 1 art](https://i.imgur.com/SaOoznH.png)

altTitles.ko: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

altTitles.ko-ro: Heungmang Nampyeongwaui Ihone Silpaehan Geon Gatda

altTitles.en: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.fr: Je n'ai pas réussi à divorcer de mon (vilain) mari

altTitles.pt: Falhei em me divorciar do meu esposo

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.
description.zh: 漫画简介: 社牛打工人穿成会被疯批男主处死的小恶女，却意外发现10岁的男主是个缺爱小可怜。每天糯叽叽黏人的正太小乖乖，在小恶女的养成下，还会成为腹黑疯批吗？

title.en: Oritsu Majutsu Gakuin No Kichiku Koshi

altTitles.ja: 王立魔術学院の鬼畜講師

altTitles.en: Demon Instructor at the Royal Academy of Magic

description.en:
Setsuna is a perverted instructor who is unable to invoke magic. As a part-time Instructor at the Royal Academy of Magic, he continually tells his students to self-study. The new students who entered the academy with high expectations are disappointed in Setsuna, and judging him to be incompetent, they challenge him to a Geas duel.

《Will you resign if I win?》
《"I"? Surely you mean "we"... All of you have been pretty annoying, so I want you all to take me on. But in return, you know what will happen if you lose, right?》

Setsuna plays with the special students, who are the best in a hundred years, with perverse and astonishing magic that is unthinkable in common sense! But behind the demon-like behavior, could there be a true purpose...?
description.ja: この世のすべての変態性を受け継いだかのような男の『指導』が今、始まる！
description.pt-br:
Setsuna é um instrutor pervertido que não consegue invocar magia. 
Como professor de meio período na Royal Academy of Magic, ele continuamente diz a seus alunos para estudarem sozinhos.
Os novos alunos que entraram na academia com grandes expectativas ficam desapontados com Setsuna e, julgando-o incompetente, desafiam-no para um duelo de Geass.

- Você vai renunciar de seu cargo se eu ganhar?
- "EU"? Certamente você quer dizer "nós". Todos vocês têm sido muito irritantes, então quero que todos vocês me enfrentem. Mas, em troca, você sabe o que acontecerá se perder, certo?

Setsuna brinca com os alunos especiais, que são os melhores em cem anos, com uma magia perversa e surpreendente que é impensável no senso comum!
Mas por trás do comportamento demoníaco, poderia haver um verdadeiro propósito...?

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en: Elementary school student Ichijou Hotaru has moved with her parents from Tokyo to the middle of the country. Now she must adapt to her new school, where there are a total of 5 students in the same class who range through elementary and middle school ages. Join their everyday adventures in the countryside.
description.ru:
История разворачивается в отдаленной деревеньке Асахигаока, в школе, где учится всего пять учеников, причем каждый — на разном году обучения. Однажды 11-летняя Хотару Итидзё переселилась из Токио в настоящую японскую глубинку – настолько глухую, что до ближайшего книжного магазина час езды поездом. Нравы здесь простые, двери никто не запирает – зачем, ведь все друг друга знают до седьмого колена. Излишне говорить, что в сельской школе в одной комнате учится все местное детское население – первоклассница Рэнгэ, семиклассница Нацуми, ее сестра восьмиклассница Комари и их на год старший брат Сугуру. А теперь вот еще и пятиклассница Хотару прибавилась! Конечно, сперва многие сцены деревенского быта показались юной столичной жительнице странными и необычными. Но потом Хотару, кстати, в обоих отношениях весьма развитая для своего возраста, начала понимать, что «на всякого мудреца довольно простоты». На природе под ясным небом чувства делаются проще, чище и глубже, а развлекаться с подругами среди полей и холмов можно не хуже, чем в каменных джунглях Гиндзы или Синдзюку. У главной героини появился отличный шанс стать лучше, мудрее и ответственнее, и тогда за взрослую и зрелую девушку ее будет принимать не только наивная малышка Комари!  
  
The following are links to AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime:  
[Season 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15149)  
[OAV 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20465) (side story)  
[Season 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16655)  
[OAV 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20466) (side story)  
[Movie](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20464) (sequel to season 2)  
[Season 3](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=22215)
description.pt-br:
Bem-vindo à vila rural de Asahigaoka, uma pitoresca cidade distante da agitação da cidade grande. Você não poderia imaginar um cenário mais isolado em todo o Japão. Então, quando Hotaru Ichijo, uma estudante do ensino fundamental criada em Tóquio, se transfere para a pequena escola secundária de Asahigaoka devido ao trabalho de seu pai, ela enfrenta o choque cultural de sua vida!

Junte-se a Hotaru e seus novos amigos, a excêntrica Renge e as irmãs travessas Natsumi e Komari, enquanto compartilham aventuras diárias no idílico interior japonês.

description.en: Ukiyo Meguru is in love with his childhood friend, Tatsumi Sara. One day, he meets a white snake that can "see the future"...!?
description.pt-br: Ukiyo Meguru que está apaixonado pela sua amiga de infância, Tatsumi Sara, um dia encontra uma cobra branca que diz "eu posso ver o futuro...!?"

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: She is the neighbor Angel, I am spoilt by her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン異伝 キバオウはん！

altTitles.en: Sword Art Online Alternate Story: Kibaou-han!

altTitles.ru: Sword Art Online: Альтернативная история Кибао-хана!

description.en: A spin-off of the Sword Art Online series focusing on Kibaou.

altTitles.ja: 女神敗北 転生のヴァラノワ

description.en:
"Prisoners" who committed crimes and ended their lives while possessing powers that surpassed humans.
However, the "prisoners", whose strength and beauty are seen by the gods, are revived as "warriors".
"Varanova" is a beautiful human warrior who fights on behalf of the gods in the wars caused by the gods.

The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

title.en: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Meteor Mission!

altTitles.ja: スーパードラゴンボールヒーローズ メテオミッション！

description.en:
After defeating Dark King Demigra, Goku, and his allies go to visit the Planet of the Kaio, only to find that Kaio North and co. are nowhere to be seen...
While our heroes are trying to figure out what could have happened, a mysterious new foe appears!
description.es:
Después de derrotar al Rey Oscuro Demigra, Goku y sus aliados van a visitar el Planeta Kaio, solo para descubrir que Kaio North y compañía no se ven por ninguna parte...
Mientras nuestros héroes intentan descubrir qué pudo haber sucedido, ¡aparece un nuevo enemigo misterioso!
description.ja:
冥王デミグラを倒した悟空たちは界王星を訪れるが、そこには界王ノースたちがいた。 どこにも見当たりません...
ヒーローたちが何が起こったのかを解明しようとしている間に、謎の新たな敵が現れます。

altTitles.en: The Mirror Who Only Speaks the Truth

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?  
  
- [Part 1 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1030773596430327808)
- [Part 2 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1044057437831979008)
- [Part 3 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1065586182698889216)

Alock, taking pride in being an aristocrat, falls in love with Klopp at first sight, a nobleman of a family of lower social status whom he met by chance.
Ignoring the difference in social rank, wealth as well as the taboo of both being Alphas, Alock approaches Klopp, only to be disregarded by Klopp who later marries an Omega.
Blinded by jealousy, Alock ultimately commits a terrible sin. Having learned the truth, Klopp takes a ruthless revenge. Alock struggles and tries to resist all while slowly enduring the price to pay for his sin…

"What you did wasn't love."
"If that wasn't love, I don't know what I should call this feeling."

If given the chance to turn back time, would it make a difference to the pair’s relationship?

'Can life become a blessing once again? 
Can I be guided towards the light once again?
Will I be able to see him along the path under the cedar trees once again?'

altTitles.ja: オオカミだけど傷つけません

altTitles.en: I'm a Wolf, but I Won't Harm You

altTitles.zh: 虽然是狼，但不会伤害你

description.en:
Lucy Leopardi has no friends. But of course she doesn’t—she’s a lamb born into a family of lions! Lonely, insecure, and desperate for friendship, Lucy can’t wait to make her first friend. One fateful night on a ballroom balcony, she meets Roman, a charming, young dog with whom she makes an instant connection. But when his association with the infamous House of Baskerville comes to light, will their newfound friendship blossom, or will dishonesty bite into their budding relationship?

description.ja:
獅子の血族であり、政治の名門として有名なレオパルディ家から羊が生まれた！？ 肉食動物の間で心の拠り所を見つけられず、ひとりぼっちで生きてきた羊のルーシー。 ある日、社交パーティーで煌く銀髪と大きい耳のローマンに出会う。羊だという事実にも関わらず彼女に心を寄せるローマンにルーシーは心を開き始めるが、ローマンには秘密があった… 雑食動物の犬であると言っていたローマンは、実は肉食動物のオオカミだったのだ！結ばれない自分たちの運命を変えようとする二人のラブストーリー！

description.ko:
사자 혈족이자 정치 명문으로 유명한 레오파르디 가문에서 양이 태어났다고?!

‘루시, 8대조 할머니께서 양이셨단다….’

육식 동물 혈족 사이에서 마음 둘 곳 없이 외롭게 살아가던 루시.
평소처럼 파티에서 홀로 놀던 그녀에게 반짝이는 은발 사이로 귀가 쫑긋 솟은 로만이 다가온다.

그러던 어느 날, 로만의 비밀이 루시에게 커다란 배신감을 안기는데!

“야, 너 개라며?! 개라며!”
이루어질 수 없는 운명의 둘은 과연 맺어질 수 있을까?

description.zh:
以政治名门享有声望的狮子家族居然诞下了一只羊?!“露西，第八代祖母其实也是只羊…”在肉食血族中孤独生活的露西，有一天一如既往在派对上也是形单影只的她，突然有一位竖着耳朵的银发男子罗蒙向她走来，就这样她们彼此吸引，彼此欣赏，并且成为了亲密朋友。然而有一天露西发现了他的秘密，“你不是说你是犬类吗？！怎么是只狼！” 两人的命运究竟会如何呢？

description.en: To repair the singularity of the future, the main character, Ritsuka Fujimaru, will shift again to lay down a tremendous battle.
description.pt-br: Ao lidar com a incineração da ordem humana, Fujimaru Ritsuka se depara com uma nova e incompreensiva ameaça. Tudo começa quando um navio petroleiro denominado Seraphix desaparece sem deixar rastros.

description.en:
Lark is different from the rest of the kids. He has red eyes, just like Vampires do, and he is bullied by the other kids for it. One day he meets Setz, a kid who also has red eyes and is the only one that doesn't call him a monster or bully him. Eventually they become friends, but when Lark finds out he may have to return to the orphanage, Setz decides he does not want to lose his friend and invites him to his home… The world of the Vampires.  
  
Note: This project began as an amateur manhwa on Naver, but became popular enough that Naver chose to turn it into a professional work. The author and artist changed their pen names and restarted the series from the beginning, redesigning the artwork and part of the storyline in the process.

altTitles.ja: となりのメタラーさん

description.en:
About to freeze to death on a day of heavy snow, Kento is saved by his neighbor Soushi. Dressed all in black, taciturn and scary-looking, Soushi seems hard to approach, but his eyes, almost hidden by his long hair, shine as if pleading for something. After that day, the two of them end up eating together every day for one year. Kento, while hiding the fact that he's gay, doesn't want the peaceful and happy time they share to come to an end. Can he keep a lid on his feelings…?!  

  
This is the story before I welcome the second spring after my encounter with Soushi-san…  
  
Kento, a poor graduate student, is about to be frozen to death on a heavy snowfall day, when he is rescued by his neighbor, Soushi. Soushi might be dressed in all-black, is taciturn, has a fierce gaze, and is hard to approach, but his eyes hidden behind his long hair sway, like he longs to say something. It's been a year since they've been sharing meals together. Kento fears that his days of happiness will come to an end, which is why he hides the fact that he's gay from him.  
But, in the end, will he able to continue to live like this while shutting out his ever growing feelings…?

altTitles.en: Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku

altTitles.id: Cinta itu Sulit untuk Seorang Otaku

altTitles.es: Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku

altTitles.pl: Wotakoi. Miłość jest trudna dla otaku

altTitles.pt-br: Wotakoi: O amor é difícil para otakus

altTitles.th: ยากแท้จริงหนอรักของโอตาคุ

description.de:
Narumi ist ein Vollblut-Nerd. Doch ihre Liebe zu Manga und Anime trifft bei Normalo-Männern nicht gerade auf Verständnis – sobald sie hinter ihr Geheimnis kommen, nehmen sie Reißaus! Zum Glück bietet sich ihr alter Kindheitsfreund Hirotaka – selbst hoffnungsloser Game-Nerd – als Freund an. Aber kann die Rechnung Nerd + Nerd = Liebe wirklich aufgehen?

The Big Bang Theory trifft auf Manga – eine herrlich durchgeknallte Rom-Com nicht nur für Nerds!
description.en: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
description.es:
"Cuando me preguntan qué clase de manga es Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku, como no estoy muy segura de si es un shojo, uno romántico o un manga cómico, al final explico que es un combate de amor entre integrantes de una especie diferente."

Fujita

Él, un gamer empedernido. Ella, una fujoshi. Ambos guardan sus secretos bajo su apariencia profesional. ¿Podrán mantener una relación sin revelarlos o sin que sus pasatiempos se interpongan entre ellos?
description.fr: Narumi et Hirotaka travaillent dans la même société. Ce sont tous deux des otaku. Ils ont chacun une passion dévorante pas toujours évidente à faire entendre aux autres. Peut-elle même être compatible avec une relation amoureuse ? Comprendre l'autre, l'accepter tel qu'il est, se montrer tel qu'on est vraiment... Misant sur ce point commun, «des otaku,» ils décident alors de sortir ensemble. Mais comme dans toutes les histoires d'amours, des interrogations et des doutes persistent. Leur passion va-t-elle les rapprocher ou les séparer? Heureusement les amis sont là pour en discuter mais aussi pour partager leur «otaku attitude.»
description.id: Kisah percintaan Narumi Momose amat sulit. Dia diputuskan oleh pacarnya setelah sang pacar tahu kalau Narumi adalah fujoshi. Akhirnya dia memutuskan untuk pindah kerja dan menyembunyikan kenyataan kalau dirinya seorang otaku di kantor barunya. Tapi di tempat kerja barunya dia malah bertemu dengan Hirotaka Nifuji, teman masa kecilnya yang tampan dan terampil tapi otaku gamer kelas berat. Mendengar keluhan Narumi mengenai otaku yang tidak akan berhasil dalam cinta, Hirotaka pun mengajak Narumi berpacaran sebagai sesama otaku!? “Kalau aku pasti akan menemanimu mengumpulkan material atau naik level. Aku nggak akan mengecewakanmu atau membuatmu menangis Ditambah lagi, aku bisa membantumu berjualan di comiket akhir pekan minggu depan.
description.it:
L'amore non è un gioco. Nemmeno quando è ad alto tasso nerd.

Narumi e Hirotaka: professione impiegati e... otaku hardcore. Tenere segreta la passione per manga, anime e videogiochi può essere utile per essere considerati normali, ma legarsi a chi la condivide sarà la strada più agevole per trovare il vero amore?
description.ja: 隠れ腐女子のOL・成海(なるみ)と、ルックス良く有能だが重度のゲーヲタである宏嵩(ひろたか)とのヲタク同士の不器用な恋愛を描いたラブコメディ。『次にくるマンガ大賞2014』の〝本にして欲しいWebマンガ部門〟第1位、pixiv内オリジナルコミックブックマーク数歴代1位の大人気作品が多数の描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化。
description.ko:
일본 현지 420만부 돌파!
이 만화가 대단해 2016 여자편 제1위, 2018년 일본 현지 TV애니메이션 방영 확정
게임 오타쿠 X 숨덕 부녀자

숨은 부녀자인 나루미는 새로 옮긴 직장에서 잘생기고 능력 있지만 심각한 게임 오타쿠 히로타카와 재회한다. 일단 연인이 되긴 했지만 오타쿠 친구이자 서툰 두 사람에게 연애는 어렵기만 하고. 오타쿠라면 고개를 끄덕일 시추에이션 가득하다. 오타쿠가 아닌 사람이라도 피식피식 웃다가 찡 하게 눈물이 고이게 되는, 픽시브에서 연재되었던 초인기 작품이 마침내 한국 정식 발간했다.
description.pl: Narumi Momose dobrze wie, że bycie sobą nie zawsze sprawdza się w romantycznych związkach. Faceci porzucali ją już z wielu powodów. Gdy jednak jeden z nich zakończył znajomość, bo dowiedział się, że Narumi jest otaku, miarka się przebrała. Nauczona doświadczeniem, w nowej pracy nikomu nie mówi więc o swoich zainteresowaniach. Przypadek sprawia, że w tej samej firmie pracuje jej kolega z gimnazjum, a zarazem zapalony fan gier, Hirotaka Nifuji. Aby upewnić się, że jej sekret jest bezpieczny, Narumi wyciąga go na obiad i przestrzega, aby wiedzę o jej wstydliwych upodobaniach zatrzymał dla siebie. On ma jednak inną propozycję - a może by tak zostali parą?
description.pt: Apesar de Narumi Momose esconder seu gosto por histórias yaoi, seu namorado descobre tal hobby e termina o relacionamento. Para renovar sua vida, ela decide mudar de trabalho e lá acaba encontrando seu amigo de infância, Hirotaka Nifuji, um viciado em video games, que por pouco não revela o segredo de sua amiga. Então, ela decide sugerir um plano para que ele nunca mais fale sobre o assunto, mas não contava com uma contraproposta: por que não começarem a namorar? Obcecados por seus interesses pessoais, será difícil para eles manterem um relacionamento.
description.ru: Наруми — обычная офисная работница... которая втайне ото всех рисует яойную мангу. Хиротака на хорошем счету в своей компании... и в то же время он — интроверт и хардкорный геймер. Читайте историю их неуклюжей любви в романтической комедии «Так сложно любить отаку»!
description.th: นารุมิ และ ฮิโรทากะ อดีตเพื่อนสมัยเด็กที่แต่เดิมทั้งสองนั้นก็มีความชื่นชอบในวัฒนธรรมการ์ตูนและเกมอยู่แล้ว ได้กลับมาพบเจอกันอีกครั้งในฐานะเพื่อนร่วมงาน แต่ทว่าความรู้สึกบางอย่างนั้นกลับไม่เหมือนเดิม... ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งสองจะเป็นอย่างไร จะสามารถพัฒนาจากเพื่อนสมัยเด็กกลายเป็นคนรักได้หรือไม่ นี่คือเรื่องราวความรักที่สุดแสนจะโรแมนติคคอมเมดี้ ระหว่างหนุ่มสาวโอตาคุที่กำลังเริ่มต้นขึ้น
description.uk:
Як же важко будувати стосунки отаку... Багато людей не розуміють нас і цураються, косі погляди чекають на нас практично скрізь, куди б ми не йшли. Тому що ми не такі, як оточуючі, і їх це лякає... Але ж ми теж люди і теж хочемо любові і розуміння, відчувати, що ми не самотні...

Момосе Нарумі, 26 років, отаку, раптово дізнається, що тепер працюватиме з хлопцем, якого знає з початкової школи, але з вступу до старшої вона його не бачила... Що ж принесе це їй - самотній любительці чоловічого кохання та отоме-ігор , а що йому - "фахівцеві з відеоігор" Ніфудзі Хіротаке?

Адже... так складно любити отаку...
description.es-la: ¿Puede un oficinista que es secretamente un empedernido gamer y una mujer que es en secreto una fujoshi salir sin que sus pasatiempos se entrometan en su relación o sin revelar su secreto? Para Narumi Momose no ha sido fácil encontrar pareja, cada novio la ha dejado cuando se enteran de sus aficiones, eso la ha llevado a ocultar que es una fujoshi. Pero cuando entra a su nuevo trabajo, encuentra a su amigo de la infancia Hirotaka Nifuji quien sabe de su secreta afición. Ella pensará en un plan para que no diga su secreto, pero él le hace una contrapropuesta, ¿Por qué no empiezan a salir?
description.zh-hk: 極力隱瞞自己是個腐女的粉領族‧成海，在新公司與長相帥氣又能幹，但卻是個重度電玩宅的兒時玩伴宏嵩重逢了。為了方便，提議兩人乾脆交往，於是同為阿宅的成海與宏嵩正式成為男女朋友。而公司中的另一對情侶小柳和樺倉也是阿宅，四人經常在一起喝酒聊天。作者以自己身旁的朋友為靈感，描繪出狀況不斷又有趣的阿宅戀愛故事

description.en: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

While snow was falling on a holy night, a demon with the looks of a young girl traveled into the village and watched the warm people inside their homes. The demon was surprised when an exorcist spoke to her despite the hatred between the two species; immediately the demon became attracted to the exorcist.

A comforting story that brings together humans and demons.
description.es:
En la nevada de una noche sagrada, una demonio con la apariencia de una niña pequeña se encaminó hacia el pueblo y presenció a la gente cálida en sus hogares. La demonio se sorprendió cuando un exorcista le habló a pesar del odio entre sus mutuas especies; inmediatamente, la demonio se vió atraída al exorcista.  
  
Una historia confortable que junta a humanos y demonios.
description.id:
Saat salju turun pada malam natal, Akuma-chan dengan penampilan seorang gadis muda melakukan perjalanan ke desa dan menyaksikan orang-orang dengan suasana hangat di dalam rumah mereka, pertemua antara Akuma-chan dan pemburu iblis pada malam itu membuat sang Akuma-chan menjadi tertarik pada pemburu iblis, apakah yang akan terjadi diantara mereka berdua?

Kisah menghibur yang menyatukan manusia dan iblis.

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en: Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
Hatsune Miku's one-panel manga series

The story follows 6 contestant participating in an all-out battle to become the Talisman as a new turning point in their lives.   
  
However is it only a matter of time before their past catches up with them?
Collection of April Fool's releases from various groups.

altTitles.th: สูตรลับร้านเด็ด

description.en:
Joo In-Gong, our main character, attends his high school reunion only to be pressured by a friend into lying about his job. Despite being unemployed, In-Gong explains he’s the owner of a MatJib, a term for a well-regarded local restaurant. To save face, In-Gong resolves to make this lie a reality and purchases an old, desolate restaurant. Business is struggling until one day he discovers an unknown seasoning left by the foreigner that lives above his shop, which immediately causes things to turn around. If only he had known just what that seasoning truly was…

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10038036)
A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

description.en: Accepting the post of Royal Tutor at the court of the king of Grannzreich, Heine Wittgenstein is a little professor with a big job ahead! Each of the kingdom's four princes has a rather distinct personality. Does their diminutive new instructor have what it takes to lay down some learning? It's a comedy of educational proportions!

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
The cute Kyuu-chan is a wonder cat. Dance, sing, be happy together!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

description.en: Yonghak ultimately failed to save the world despite repeated regressions. At the next regression, he decides to quit being a savior. But suddenly, disciples show up, one by one... Will the world be kept safe?! Will the savior be able to fulfill his bucket list of wishes for rest?!
description.ko:
반복되는 회귀에도 결국 세상을 구원하지 못한 용학 
다음 회귀에 이르러 구원자를 그만두기로 한다. 
그런데 하나둘 제자가 생기고… 세상이 자꾸만 구원되기 시작한다?! 
과연 구원자는 쉬고 싶어 하는 자신의 버킷리스트를 이룰 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: 喰う寝るふたり 住むふたり

description.en: Ritsuko and Shuichi have been dating for ten years, and living together for eight. The two are more than lovers, and just before marriage.

title.en: Hikikomori Reijou wa Hanashi no Wakaru Seijuuban

altTitles.ja: 引きこもり令嬢は話のわかる聖獣番

altTitles.ja-ro: Hikikomori Reijou wa Hanashi no Wakaru Seijuu-ban

altTitles.en: The Shut-in Lady Is an Understanding Sacred Beast Caretaker
The Shut-in Lady Is a Reasonable Sacred Beast Caretaker

altTitles.zh-hk: 家裏蹲大小姐是懂獸醫的聖獸飼養員

altTitles.zh: 家里蹲大小姐是懂兽医的圣兽饲养员

altTitles.ko: 히키코모리 영애는 말이 통하는 성수 지킴이
은둔형 외톨이 영애는 말이 통하는 성수 돌보미

altTitles.th: คุณหนูพูดไม่เก่งกับนานาสัตว์มหัศจรรย์

description.en:
"We need money for your bedridden mother. So please, work at the Royal Palace!"

This is what the daughter of a Count, Muriel, was told by her father one day, which she firmly refused.

That's because she's a shut-in whose weakness is socializing, simply immersing herself in books. "No way am I going to work at the Royal Palace!" is what she thought, but her father proposed she work as a librarian. Thinking that she might be able to work there if it's that, Muriel immediately went for an interview, but–

Why is she being interviewed by Commander Silas who exudes sensuality?! And why is it that when she came to, she was already employed as the "Sacred Beast Caretaker," someone who takes care of the sacred beasts?! A very popular work from Ichijinsha's Iris Collection!!! The long-awaited comicalization of the Sacred Beast love comedy between a shut-in lady and the commander of the Sacred Beast Order!!

altTitles.ja: 王様達のヴァイキング

description.en: 18-year-old Koreeda Kazuki is a genius hacker whose only real skill lies with computers. Into his aimless life steps a wealthy man who makes him a proposition he finds impossible to refuse: that he will become Koreeda's investor on the condition that Koreeda use his abilities to help the man "conquer the world." In cyberspace where national borders hold no meaning, thus begins the story of two modern-day adventurers who stand against crime on a global scale.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Sen no SKILL o Motsu Otoko Isekai de Shoukan Kemono Hajimemashita!

altTitles.ja: 千のスキルを持つ男　異世界で召喚獣はじめました！

altTitles.en: A Man With A Thousand Skills started as a Summoned Beast in a Different World!

description.en: Hinoharu Kota is bored with his life as a middle-aged office worker, and his marriage with his new wife is beginning to strain. One day, he is accidentally summoned to another world as a beast summon. Fantastically, each time he is summoned between worlds he obtains a new skill. Soon, he finds himself contracted with a female knight. Where will his growing powers and adventures between two worlds take him?!

description.fr: Même endroit, temps différent - Une romance qui glisse dans le temps.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en:
A mysterious and unknown game journey.  
In the virtual game, experience the brilliance and darkness of human nature. When the player's game journey reaches the end, what is waiting for them …

altTitles.en: Top boys & Queen bee & KITAZAWA in A-class!!

description.en:
Masashi Kitazawa, a sophomore in high school, had a trauma. The trauma is that I was fat when I was a child!

Kitazawa, who diligently dieted and worked hard in middle school, grew up to be a handsome man and was supposed to lead a peaceful school life, but... In the new semester of high school, handsome men and beautiful girls have gathered in Kitazawa's 2nd year class A for some reason. What's more, he received a secret invitation from Ayame Yagyu, the most beautiful girl in her grade...!?
description.es-la: Kitazawa Masashi es parte de los 3 chicos más aputos de la preparatoria Nishiki pero oculta un pasado que no le quiere revelar a nadie, hasta que su compañera Yagyu Ayame lo descubre y le cuenta el secreto que ella también guarda, ahora serán cómplices en guardar el secreto del otro, mientras Kitazawa trata de mantener su estatus de "chico popular"...

title.en: Company and Private Life -On and Off-

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活－オンとオフ－

altTitles.es-la: Vida Empresarial y Privada - ON y OFF -

description.en:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). Some are office workers and Lolita in women's clothing. Others are office workers and punks dressed as men.

The gap between on and off life is a must-see! A daily tale of two working people's metamorphosis!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
description.ja:
働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！
働く人々には会社（オン）と私生活（オフ）がある。ある人は会社員と女装ロリィタ。ある人は会社員と男装パンク。オンとオフのギャップにキュン必至！ 働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！X（旧:Twitter）にて累計200万いいね突破の話題作が、イラストから完全コマ割りでコミックス化！
description.es-la: Estos trabajadores tienen una vida en la empresa (ON) y otra privada (OFF). El es un oficinista que se viste de Lolita. Ella es una oficinistas que se viste de punk.

altTitles.ja: きみがローファーをはいたら

description.en:
Rinne Miki is a normal first year's high school girl who loves fashion and is close with her friends.
But, she has a caring personality too, so though she has opposite-sex friends, that never became romantic, and she lived her life without romance.
But, on the day of the school festival, she meets Toma, a boy with a slightly mysterious atmosphere to him... though she's bewildered by how aggressively the younger boy approaches here, gradually, she starts to see him as...?
description.ja:
高校1年生の三木凜音はオシャレが大好きで友達想いな普通の女の子。
でも世話好きの性格もあって、異性とは友達にはなっても恋愛に至ることはなく、恋心とは無縁に生きてきた。
そんな彼女だが、文化祭の日にちょっと不思議な雰囲気の少年・冬馬と出会って…。
グイグイくる年下男子に戸惑いながらも、だんだんと凜音も冬馬のことが…？
